alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Northern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 22 at 2:07AM MST until January 22 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST /9 AM MST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one half mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Northern Lea and Central Lea Counties. In Texas, Gaines, Dawson, Borden and Scurry Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CST /9 AM MST/ this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. Allow extra time to arrive at your destination.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Northern Lea County
